Package sample.mvc

Class Model

java.lang.Object
sample.mvc.Model
public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
Model encapsulates various methods that need to be used in View. It cooperates with the StartMeUp object gameEngine to run the game. In addition to satisfying the basic operations of the game, it also provides some other functions (save the game, load the game, etc.)

  • Property Summary

    • MovesCount

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty MovesCountProperty
      This is the method used to get the IntegerProperty of moves count. It passes the IntegerProperty movesCountProperty to View.

    • LevelTime

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty LevelTimeProperty
      This is the method used to get the IntegerProperty of time of level. It passes the IntegerProperty levelTimeProperty to View.

  • Constructor Details

    • Model

      public Model()
      This is the only constructor of the Model class. It initializes the GridPane gameGrid.

  • Method Details

    • GetGameGrid

      public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane GetGameGrid()
      This is the method used to get the GridPane gameGrid.
      Returns:
      a GridPane gameGrid to View.

    • loadDefaultSaveFile

      void loadDefaultSaveFile​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, java.lang.String nickName)
      This is the method used to load the default game. It load the game file, initialize game and set event filter.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - Stage passed in from Main.
      nickName - String representing the player's nickname obtained from View.

    • InitializeGame

      public void InitializeGame​(java.io.InputStream input)
      This is the method used to initialize the game. It set the game by instancing a StartMeUp object gameEngine.
      Parameters:
      input - InputStream representing the game file.

    • SetEventFilter

      public void SetEventFilter()
      This is the method used to set the event filter. It gets the event passed in from the keyboard and calls the HandleKey method as a parameter.

    • GetGameEngine

      public StartMeUp GetGameEngine()
      This is the method used to get the game engine in the Model. It passes the gameEngine in the Model to SubModel.
      Returns:
      StartMeUp gameEngine.

    • SetTimeLevel

      public void SetTimeLevel​(int time)
      This is the method used to set the time of level in the game. It set the current levelTime to the saved int time.
      Parameters:
      time - int representing the time of level in the saved game.

    • SetTimeTotal

      public void SetTimeTotal​(int time)
      This is the method used to set the total time in the game. It set the current totalTime to the saved int time.
      Parameters:
      time - int representing the total time in the saved game.

    • MovesCountProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty MovesCountProperty()
      This is the method used to get the IntegerProperty of moves count. It passes the IntegerProperty movesCountProperty to View.

    • SetMovesCount

      public void SetMovesCount()
      This is the method used to set the IntegerProperty movesCountProperty. It set the content of IntegerProperty movesCountProperty to int movesCount.

    • GetMovesCount

      public int GetMovesCount()
      This is the method used to get the moves count. It passes the int movesCount to View.
      Returns:
      int movesCount which is the current moves count.

    • LevelTimeProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty LevelTimeProperty()
      This is the method used to get the IntegerProperty of time of level. It passes the IntegerProperty levelTimeProperty to View.

    • SetLevelTime

      public void SetLevelTime()
      This is the method used to set the IntegerProperty levelTimeProperty. It set the content of IntegerProperty levelTimeProperty to int levelTime.

    • GetLevelTime

      public int GetLevelTime()
      This is the method used to get the time of level. It passes the int levelTime to View.
      Returns:
      int levelTime which is the current time of level.

    • Clock

      public void Clock()
      This is the method used to time each level. It set up an infinite timeline, and adds 1 to int levelTime every second

    • reloadGrid

      void reloadGrid()
      This is the method to reload the game grid. It displays the information and returns after each level is over, and reloads all objects in the current level at other times.

    • GetLevelFilePath

      public java.lang.String GetLevelFilePath()
      This is the method used to get the file path corresponding to the current level.
      Returns:
      String levelFile which is the file path.

    • ShowHighscoreListLevel

      public java.lang.String ShowHighscoreListLevel()
      This method save and update the high score list of current level to a file. It passes the high score list of current level to ShowLevelMessage().
      Returns:
      String list which is the high score list of current level.

    • ShowHighscoreList

      public java.lang.String ShowHighscoreList()
      This method save and update the high score list of the game to a file. It passes the high score list of the game to ShowVictoryMessage().
      Returns:
      String list which is the high score list of the game.

    • ShowLevelMessage

      public void ShowLevelMessage()
      This method shows the victory message of current level. It get the high score list from ShowHighscoreListLevel() and append some extra information and shows.

    • ShowVictoryMessage

      public void ShowVictoryMessage()
      This method shows the victory message of the game. It get the high score list from ShowHighscoreList() and append some extra information and shows.

    • NewDialog

      public void NewDialog​(java.lang.String dialogTitle, java.lang.String dialogMessage, javafx.scene.effect.Effect dialogMessageEffect)
      This method provides several dialog options. If the level is completed, it shows a dialog with a button to move to next level. Else if the game is completed, it shows a dialog with a button to exit. Otherwise, it shows a dialog without button.
      Parameters:
      dialogTitle - String dialogTitle which is the title of the dialog.
      dialogMessage - String dialogMessage which is the message of the dialog.
      dialogMessageEffect - Effect dialogMessageEffect which is the effect of the dialog message.

    • AddObjectToGrid

      public void AddObjectToGrid​(GameObject gameObject, java.awt.Point location)
      This method add an object to a specific location.
      Parameters:
      gameObject - GameObject which is the object to be added.
      location - Point which is the point to be added.

    • GameFile

      public java.lang.String GameFile()
      This method append some extra information to the saved game.
      Returns:
      String which is the information of the saved game.

    • SaveGame

      public void SaveGame()
      This method is used to save the game. It write the String get from GameFile() to a file.

    • LoadGameFile

      public void LoadGameFile() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      This method is used to load a saved game file. It calls InitializeGame() method to initialize the saved game. And then set the time of level to the saved one.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - when the game file is not founded.

    • LoadGame

      public void LoadGame()
      This method load the game by calling LoadGameFile() method.

    • PauseGame

      public void PauseGame()
      This method is used to pause the game. If the game is paused, it continue timing and make the keeper movable by set isGamePause to false. Otherwise, it pause timing and make the keeper immovable by set isGamePause to true.
